splitting_map_eq_id:

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝟙» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `simplex_category.mk -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝟙» -/
theorem splitting_map_eq_id (Δ : «expr ᵒᵖ» SimplexCategory) :
    SimplicialObject.Splitting.map (Γ₀.obj K)
        (fun n : ℕ =>
          Sigma.ι (Γ₀.Obj.summand K (op (simplex_category.mk n))) (Splitting.IndexSet.id (op (simplex_category.mk n))))
        Δ =
      («expr𝟙») _ :=
  by
  ext A
  trace "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Tactic/Builtin.lean:73:14: unsupported tactic `discrete_cases #[]"
  induction Δ using Opposite.rec'
  induction' Δ with n
  dsimp
  simp only [colimit.ι_desc, cofan.mk_ι_app, comp_id, Γ₀.obj_map]
  rw [Γ₀.obj.map_on_summand₀ K (SimplicialObject.Splitting.IndexSet.id A.1)
      (show «expr ≫ » A.e ((«expr𝟙») _) = «expr ≫ » A.e.op.unop ((«expr𝟙») _) by rfl),
    Γ₀.obj.termwise.map_mono_id, A.ext']
  apply id_comp
#align splitting_map_eq_id splitting_map_eq_id
splitting_iso_hom_eq_id:

@[simp]
theorem splitting_iso_hom_eq_id (Δ : «expr ᵒᵖ» SimplexCategory) : ((splitting K).iso Δ).hom = («expr𝟙») _ :=
  splitting_map_eq_id K Δ
#align splitting_iso_hom_eq_id splitting_iso_hom_eq_id
on_Γ₀_summand_id:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `simplex_category.mk -/
theorem higher_faces_vanish.on_Γ₀_summand_id (K : ChainComplex C ℕ) (n : ℕ) :
    HigherFacesVanish (n + 1) ((Γ₀.splitting K).ι_summand (Splitting.IndexSet.id (op (simplex_category.mk (n + 1))))) :=
  by
  intro j hj
  have eq := Γ₀.obj.map_mono_on_summand_id K (SimplexCategory.δ j.succ)
  rw [Γ₀.obj.termwise.map_mono_eq_zero K, zero_comp] at eq; rotate_left
  · intro h
    exact (nat.succ_ne_self n) (congr_arg SimplexCategory.len h)
  · exact fun h => Fin.succ_ne_zero j (by simpa only [is_δ₀.iff] using h)
  exact Eq
#align higher_faces_vanish.on_Γ₀_summand_id higher_faces_vanish.on_Γ₀_summand_id

@[reassoc.1]
theorem map_on_summand₀' {Δ Δ' : «expr ᵒᵖ» SimplexCategory} (A : Splitting.IndexSet Δ) (θ : «expr ⟶ » Δ Δ') :
    «expr ≫ » (Sigma.ι (summand K Δ) A) (map K θ) =
      «expr ≫ » (Termwise.mapMono K (image.ι («expr ≫ » θ.unop A.e))) (Sigma.ι (summand K _) (A.pull θ)) :=
  map_on_summand₀ K A (A.fac_pull θ)

@[reassoc.1]
theorem map_on_summand₀ {Δ Δ' : «expr ᵒᵖ» SimplexCategory} (A : Splitting.IndexSet Δ) {θ : «expr ⟶ » Δ Δ'}
    {Δ'' : SimplexCategory} {e : «expr ⟶ » Δ'.unop Δ''} {i : «expr ⟶ » Δ'' A.1.unop} [Epi e] [Mono i]
    (fac : «expr ≫ » e i = «expr ≫ » θ.unop A.e) :

@[reassoc.1]
theorem obj.map_on_summand' {Δ Δ' : «expr ᵒᵖ» SimplexCategory} (A : Splitting.IndexSet Δ) (θ : «expr ⟶ » Δ Δ') :

@[reassoc.1]
theorem obj.map_on_summand {Δ Δ' : «expr ᵒᵖ» SimplexCategory} (A : Splitting.IndexSet Δ) (θ : «expr ⟶ » Δ Δ')
    {Δ'' : SimplexCategory} {e : «expr ⟶ » Δ'.unop Δ''} {i : «expr ⟶ » Δ'' A.1.unop} [Epi e] [Mono i]

map_mono_δ₀':
theorem map_mono_δ₀' (hi : Isδ₀ i) : mapMono K i = K.d Δ.len Δ'.len :=
  by
  unfold map_mono
  classical
    rw [dif_neg, dif_pos hi]
    rintro rfl
    simpa only [self_eq_add_right, nat.one_ne_zero] using hi.1
#align map_mono_δ₀' map_mono_δ₀'
map_mono_δ₀:
@[simp]
theorem map_mono_δ₀ {n : ℕ} : mapMono K (δ (0 : Fin (n + 2))) = K.d (n + 1) n :=
  mapMono_δ₀' K _ (by rw [is_δ₀.iff])
#align map_mono_δ₀ map_mono_δ₀
map_mono_on_summand_id:

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝟙» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
@[reassoc.1]
theorem obj.map_mono_on_summand_id {Δ Δ' : SimplexCategory} (i : «expr ⟶ » Δ' Δ) [Mono i] :
    «expr ≫ » ((splitting K).ι_summand (Splitting.IndexSet.id (op Δ))) ((obj K).map i.op) =
      «expr ≫ » (Obj.Termwise.mapMono K i) ((splitting K).ι_summand (Splitting.IndexSet.id (op Δ'))) :=
  Obj.map_on_summand K (Splitting.IndexSet.id (op Δ)) i.op (rfl : «expr ≫ » ((«expr𝟙») _) i = «expr ≫ » i ((«expr𝟙») _))

theorem map_mono_naturality : «expr ≫ » (mapMono K i) (f.f Δ'.len) = «expr ≫ » (f.f Δ.len) (mapMono K' i) :=
  by
  unfold map_mono
  split_ifs
  · subst h
    simp only [id_comp, eq_to_hom_refl, comp_id]

map_mono_id:

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝟙» -/
theorem map_mono_id : mapMono K ((«expr𝟙») Δ) = («expr𝟙») _ :=
  by
  unfold map_mono
  simp only [eq_self_iff_true, eq_to_hom_refl, dite_eq_ite, if_true]
#align map_mono_id map_mono_id
map_mono_eq_zero:
theorem map_mono_eq_zero (h₁ : Δ ≠ Δ') (h₂ : ¬Isδ₀ i) : mapMono K i = 0 :=
  by
  unfold map_mono
  rw [ne.def] at h₁
  split_ifs
  rfl
#align map_mono_eq_zero map_mono_eq_zero
map_mono_comp:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
@[simp, reassoc.1]
theorem map_mono_comp : «expr ≫ » (mapMono K i) (mapMono K i') = mapMono K («expr ≫ » i' i) :=
  by
  -- case where i : Δ' ⟶ Δ is the identity
  by_cases h₁ : Δ = Δ'
  · subst h₁
    simp only [SimplexCategory.eq_id_of_mono i, comp_id, id_comp, map_mono_id K, eq_to_hom_refl]
  -- case where i' : Δ'' ⟶ Δ' is the identity
  by_cases h₂ : Δ' = Δ''
  · subst h₂
    simp only [SimplexCategory.eq_id_of_mono i', comp_id, id_comp, map_mono_id K, eq_to_hom_refl]
  -- then the RHS is always zero
  obtain ⟨k, hk⟩ := Nat.exists_eq_add_of_lt (len_lt_of_mono i h₁)
  obtain ⟨k', hk'⟩ := Nat.exists_eq_add_of_lt (len_lt_of_mono i' h₂)
  have eq : Δ.len = Δ''.len + (k + k' + 2) := by linarith
  rw [map_mono_eq_zero K («expr ≫ » i' i) _ _]; rotate_left
  · by_contra
    simpa only [self_eq_add_right, h] using Eq
  · by_contra
    simp only [h.1, add_right_inj] at eq
    linarith
  -- in all cases, the LHS is also zero, either by definition, or because d ≫ d = 0
  by_cases h₃ : is_δ₀ i
  · by_cases h₄ : is_δ₀ i'
    · rw [map_mono_δ₀' K i h₃, map_mono_δ₀' K i' h₄, HomologicalComplex.d_comp_d]
    · simp only [map_mono_eq_zero K i' h₂ h₄, comp_zero]
  · simp only [map_mono_eq_zero K i h₁ h₃, zero_comp]
#align map_mono_comp map_mono_comp
map_epi_on_summand_id:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝟙» -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
@[reassoc.1]
theorem obj.map_epi_on_summand_id {Δ Δ' : SimplexCategory} (e : «expr ⟶ » Δ' Δ) [Epi e] :
    «expr ≫ » ((Γ₀.splitting K).ι_summand (Splitting.IndexSet.id (op Δ))) ((Γ₀.obj K).map e.op) =
      (Γ₀.splitting K).ι_summand (Splitting.IndexSet.mk e) :=
  by
  simpa only [Γ₀.obj.map_on_summand K (splitting.index_set.id (op Δ)) e.op
      (rfl : «expr ≫ » e ((«expr𝟙») Δ) = «expr ≫ » e ((«expr𝟙») Δ)),
    Γ₀.obj.termwise.map_mono_id] using id_comp _
#align obj.map_epi_on_summand_id obj.map_epi_on_summand_id
iff:
/-
Copyright (c) 2022 Joël Riou. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Joël Riou
-/
theorem iff {j : ℕ} {i : Fin (j + 2)} : Isδ₀ (SimplexCategory.δ i) ↔ i = 0 :=
  by
  constructor
  · rintro ⟨h₁, h₂⟩
    by_contra
    exact h₂ (Fin.succAbove_ne_zero_zero h)
  · rintro rfl
    exact ⟨rfl, Fin.succ_ne_zero _⟩
#align iff iff
eq_δ₀:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `simplex_category.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `simplex_category.mk -/
theorem eq_δ₀ {n : ℕ} {i : «expr ⟶ » (simplex_category.mk n) (simplex_category.mk (n + 1))} [Mono i] (hi : Isδ₀ i) :
    i = SimplexCategory.δ 0 := by
  obtain ⟨j, rfl⟩ := SimplexCategory.eq_δ_of_mono i
  rw [iff] at hi
  rw [hi]
#align eq_δ₀ eq_δ₀
P_infty_on_Γ₀_splitting_summand_eq_self:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `simplex_category.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `alternating_face_map_complex -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `simplex_category.mk -/
@[simp, reassoc.1]
theorem P_infty_on_Γ₀_splitting_summand_eq_self (K : ChainComplex C ℕ) {n : ℕ} :
    «expr ≫ » ((Γ₀.splitting K).ι_summand (Splitting.IndexSet.id (op (simplex_category.mk n))))
        ((PInfty : «expr ⟶ » (alternating_face_map_complex (Γ₀.obj K)) _).f n) =
      (Γ₀.splitting K).ι_summand (Splitting.IndexSet.id (op (simplex_category.mk n))) :=
  by
  rw [P_infty_f]
  cases n
  · simpa only [P_f_0_eq] using comp_id _
  · exact (higher_faces_vanish.on_Γ₀_summand_id K n).comp_P_eq_self
#align P_infty_on_Γ₀_splitting_summand_eq_self P_infty_on_Γ₀_splitting_summand_eq_self
